content.rendered:
24Fashion TV Exclusive: Giannina Azar brought old-school glamour back to life with stunning head-to-toe beaded and embellished womenswear. Tribal SS21 Collection inspired by the Taino tribe. Made with noble materials including wood, copper, bronze, hand-painted snails and fabrics.

Watch the full show for FREE on 24FashionTV channel on ROKU TV or Amazon Fire TV

Photo by Liza Kushnir exclusively for 24Fashion TV

LAFW powered by Art Hearts Fashion
